elements.title: Station A
elements.description: San Francisco based Station A is a platform that helps clean energy buyers instantly grade their buildings, get competitive options from qualified providers, and track their journey to zero-emissions in a transparent and all-digital way. On Bloomberg in [March 2022](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-03-30/new-clean-energy-marketplace-joins-silicon-valley-rush-to-green-buildings)

elements.title: WPD Intraflex
elements.description: Western Power Distribution's IntraFlex lowers entry barriers to owners of assets such as EV chargers, permitting them to dip into Britain's expanding market for flex trading.

elements.title: Nodes
elements.description: NODES is the independent marketplace for a sustainable energy future where grid owners, producers and consumers of energy can trade decentralised flexibility and energy. Similar to Piclo

elements.title: NCX
elements.description: NCX provides a marketplace for forest carbon payments. Our carbon credits represent real, immediate, and cost-efficient change on the landscape.

elements.title: Piclo
elements.description: Piclo, Grid flexibility marketplace Platform, similar to [Nodes](https://nodesmarket.com/).

elements.title: Labrador
elements.description: Labrador like uswitch, has an option for green sources

elements.title: the eco experts
elements.description: the eco experts for PV + battery installations. (Tried to make an enquiry but they’re just a call centre forwarding the contact to an installer, they wouldn’t even send the contact through without installation permission approval from the landlord. Been recommended to check on their website who can install in the area and contact them directly)

elements.title: EnergySage
elements.description: EnergySage is on a mission to make going solar as easy as booking a flight online. Funded by [Clean energy ventures](https://cleanenergyventures.com/)

elements.title: Renewable energy hub UK
elements.description: Renewable energy hub UK big marketplace for installers and generation devices
